text: Badr Siwane (born 1 January 1994) is a Moroccan triathlete. He was the men's winner at the 2017 and 2018 African Triathlon Championships. He represented Morocco at the 2019 African Games held in Rabat, Morocco and he won the men's triathlon event. == References == == External links == * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Moroccan male triathletes Category:African Games gold medalists for Morocco Category:African Games medalists in triathlon Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:African Games competitors for Morocco
title: Badr Siwane
